TELEMETRY REF CS_RECORDINVALID BIG_ENDIAN "The format of a command record was invalid."

    APPEND_ITEM FILENAME_LENGTH 16 UINT "Length of String Arg"
    APPEND_ITEM FILENAME 0 STRING "The name of the sequence file"
    ITEM RECORDNUMBER -64 32 UINT "The record number"
    ITEM ERROR -32 32 INT "The error code"

    ITEM MESSAGE 0 0 DERIVED "Formatted String for Argument"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf("Sequence file %s: Record %d invalid. Err: %d" , packet.read('fileName') , packet.read('recordNumber') , packet.read('error') )

      META FORMAT_STRING "Sequence file %s: Record %d invalid. Err: %d"
      META ARGS fileName recordNumber error 
    ITEM EVR_SEVERITY 0 0 DERIVED "Severity"
      GENERIC_READ_CONVERSION_START STRING 0
        sprintf('WARNING_HI')
